title: Keybindings/hud resetting
body:
my keybindings and hud keep resetting to default randomly. yesterday when i logged in it was reset and then today after i had already played 2 games when i got into my third it had reset. 
is this a known problem this patch or is anyone having this problem? its really annoying having to reset them at the start of the game and tilts me really badly.

replies.body: Beyond running a client repair, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
